law.history: Repealed 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 44, effective May 30, 1997. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 274, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 273, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 192, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1954.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Power to borrow money and issue negotiable notes.
